name: overconfident
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having or showing too much confidence: He is overconfident and cocky. I'm not overconfident or arrogant, but I do believe in my own ability.
More examplesFewer examplesI think my expectations were high and I was maybe a little bit overconfident. Swift progress made us overconfident.Over-confident brashness may not impress an interview panel.
